collection_holder_name: Arts Library, Special Collections, University of California at Los Angeles (UCLA)
pageContext.collection_title: Lloyd Bochner Collection of Scripts for Television
pageContext.collection_description: Consists primarily of television scripts related to Bochner's acting career but also contains scripts for several radio programs, including CBS Radio Mystery Theater, Mutual Radio Theater: The Adventure Show, Mutual Radio Theater: The Love Show, Sears Radio Theater and Sears Radio Theater: The Adventure Show.
